title: So confusing
content:
I am unable to decide between IT in Manipal's new banglore campus or CSE in PES EC campus. Both branches work for me but which one would be a better college overall.

[View Poll](https://www.reddit.com/poll/14qf2ze)

comments.body: in terms of placements, PES is ahead of Manipal and also haven't heard too many positive things about Manipal's Bangalore campus so if you'd ask me I'd take PES ec.

I'm in the same boat as you, but my parents prefer MIT-B because it isn't as academic-oriented as PES is. Mit-B is gonna be a big-big gamble, but if what they say is true about centralised placements, I don't really see a big problem, but again, it's a big risk. If you're willing to take the risk and see how it gets played out in 4 years, choose MIT-B.

IMO, you really shouldn't gamble when it comes to college. Always pick the safest option at this stage of your career. Whether you decide to opt for higher education or placements, PESU is currently a stable option for both.
